file_content.text: Wouldn't believe what that Republic stiff just told me. Gotta get records.
For what? Those supplies from Nar Shaddaa? They were smuggled in!
What am I supposed to do, look in the black market's files? Space that.
Hutt Cartel didn't have these 'regulations.' Comes on time, no questions asked.
We're Republic loyalists now. The creds better be worth the aggravation.
